pageTitle: Young Fabulous & Broke Shar Rio Wash Maxi Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 59in / 150cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Hand wash. Lining: 100% rayon. Shell: 100% silk. Fabric: Silk crepe. Streaked tie-dye lends a free-spirited feel to an airy silk maxi dress, styled with an empire waist. A smocked elastic panel tailors the bodice, and ruching adds movement to the long skirt. Adjustable spaghetti straps. Jersey lining. Description Young Fabulous & Broke Dresses > Young Fabulous & Broke Clothing > Casual > Dresses > Clothing >
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Created by Los Angeles-based designer Heidi Cornell McKenna, Young Fabulous & Broke clothing has gained an international reputation for embodying the spirit of California style. The brand has a knack for crafting effortless wardrobe staples that exude an easy boho style. Perhaps best known for its distinctive collection of tie-dyed maxi dresses, Young Fabulous & Broke is far-reaching in scope, offering everything from slouchy joggers to slinky black dresses.
